content:
• Why not have the comfort of just one click on "My messages" if it is built under "Starred messages" ?
  • It would prevent the need of 2 or 3 more clicks required today in order to have them by other alternatives.
Yeah, something like an 'Activity Log' or 'My Message History' with conversations you've participated in is sometimes required and can be beneficial, i guess.
yeah, I do agree having something like "Sent messages" could be nice
So, essentially another way to do "sent by me". If we can agree on the design of where to put it, this should be simple enough.

First I considered "Sent messages" (which makes sense as a menu inside individual profile, but outside of it could open a doubt: sent by whom? Then I considered "My messages", but "sent by me" sounds better than "my messages". It specifies who sent the messages without the word "my" and could be used anywhere it is required inside Zulip.
I think if we did do this, we'd likely just use Sent, and also rename Starred messagesto Starred, to match how other product (gmail, etc) do this.
